attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Fire Spin
attacks.effect: Discard 2 basic Energy cards attached to Heatran. (If you can’t discard cards, this attack does nothing.)

attacks.name: Blocking Punch
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done to Lucario by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Striking Kick
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: Intimidating Fang
abilities.effect: As long as Luxray is your Active Pokémon, any damage done by an opponent’s attack is reduced by 10 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Thunder
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, Luxray does 40 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Rock Slide
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to 2 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Triple Nose
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Supersonic
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Air Slash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, discard an Energy attached to Yanmega.

attacks.name: Worry Seed
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Magical Leaf
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage and remove 3 damage counters from Cherrim.

attacks.name: Swallow Up
attacks.effect: Before doing damage, count the remaining HP of the Defending Pokémon and Carnivine. If the Defending Pokémon has fewer remaining HP than Carnivine’s, this attack does 60 damage instead.

attacks.name: Wring Out
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fasten Claws
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Thunder Fang
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

cards.name: Night Maintenance
cards.effect: Search your discard pile for up to 3 in any combination of Pokémon and basic Energy cards. Show them to your opponent and shuffle them into your deck.

cards.name: Rare Candy
cards.effect: Choose 1 of your Basic Pokémon in play. If you have a Stage 1 or Stage 2 card that evolves from that Pokémon in your hand, put that card on the Basic Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.)

cards.name: Roseanne’s Research
cards.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 in any combination of Basic Pokémon and basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to Chimchar.

attacks.name: Ghastly Sound
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can’t play any Supporter cards from his or her hand during his or her next turn.

attacks.name: Finger Poke
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

abilities.name: Baby Evolution
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Chansey from your hand onto Happiny (this counts as evolving Happiny) and remove all damage counters from Happiny.

attacks.name: Lively
attacks.effect: Remove 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Water Splash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.
